citations.narrative:
The facility has official tags, however 5 dogs needed collars in order to attach their official ID. Official ID on dogs is
important to be able to keep track of daily husbandry and medical information for each animal. Ensure that the remaining
dogs get a collar so that they can have their official ID tags on them.
***Correct by May 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.50(a)(1) 
   
Time and method of identification. 
The facility has official tags, however 5 dogs needed collars in order to attach their official ID.  Official ID on dogs is 
important to be able to keep track of daily husbandry and medical information for each animal.  Ensure that the remaining 
dogs get a collar so that they can have their official ID tags on them.    
***Correct by May 15, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
